member.name: T:Catel.Data.ContextManager`1
member.summary: Provides an automated way to reuse Entity Framework context objects within the context of a single data portal operation.
member.typeparam: Type of the context object to use.
member.remarks:
This type stores the object context object in an internal dictionary and uses reference counting through to keep the data context object open for reuse by child objects, and to automatically dispose the object when the last consumer has called Dispose.
Note that this class is a base class to share the logic between the and .

member.name: T:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork
member.summary: Interface defining a unit of work.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.GetRepository``1
member.summary:
Gets the repository that is created specificially for this unit of work.
Note that the following conditions must be met:
The container must be registered in the as type. If the repository is declared as non-transient, it will be instantiated as new instance anyway.
The repository must have a constructor accepting a instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the entity repository.
member.exception: The specified repository type cannot be found.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves the changes inside the unit of work.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.BeginTransaction(System.Data.IsolationLevel)
member.summary: Begins a new transaction on the unit of work.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.RollBackTransaction
member.summary: Rolls back all the changes inside a transaction.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.CommitTransaction
member.summary: Commits all the changes inside a transaction.

member.name: P:Catel.Data.IUnitOfWork.IsInTransaction
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is currently in a transaction.
member.value: true if this instance is currently in a transaction; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Commits all the changes inside a transaction.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.UnitOfWork.GetRepository``1
member.summary:
Gets the repository that is created specificially for this unit of work.
Note that the following conditions must be met:
The container must be registered in the as type. If the repository is declared as non-transient, it will be instantiated as new instance anyway.
The repository must have a constructor accepting a instance.
member.typeparam: The type of the entity repository.
member.exception: The specified repository type cannot be found.

member.name: M:Catel.Data.UnitOfWork.SaveChanges(System.Data.Objects.SaveOptions)
member.summary: Saves the changes inside the unit of work.
member.exception: A transaction is running. Call CommitTransaction instead.
